name: TeX Suite
description: Support for TeX, LaTeX, ConTeXt and BibTeX

config.title: LaTeX Options
config.description: Options for building LaTeX documents with latemxk

children.title: Path to latexmk
children.description: Path to the `latexmk` utility. May be simply 'latexmk' if it is in your PATH.

children.title: PDF Engine
children.description: The default engine used to build PDF files which is used in the absence of a .latexmkrc file in the workspace folder.

children.title: Language Server
children.description: Language Server utility to use for LaTeX files.

children.title: Path to ConTeXt
children.description: Path to the `context` utility. May be simply 'context' if it is in your PATH.

children.title: Language Server
children.description: Language Server utility to use for ConTeXt files.

config.title: Skim Options
config.description: These options apply to using Skim as PDF previewer.

children.title: Path to Skim
children.description: The Skim application is used for previewing generated PDF files. Make sure that Nova is selected in Skim’s PDF–TeX Sync preferences, as explained in the Extension Help.

children.title: Revert Skim on Run
children.description: Causes the PDF file in Skim to be reloaded when you use the Run action. Should only be used if Skim isn't set up to do this automatically.

children.title: Keep Skim in background on Run
children.description: Don't bring the Skim window into foreground when the Run action is used.

configWorkspace.title: Enable LaTeX support
configWorkspace.description: Whether to provide LaTeX tasks and the LaTeX language server. Disable this if you only want to have ConTeXt support.

configWorkspace.title: Path to latexmk
configWorkspace.description: Path to the `latexmk` utility (overrides global setting if given).

configWorkspace.title: Enable ConTeXt support
configWorkspace.description: Whether to provide ConTeXt tasks and the ConTeXt language server. Disable this if you only want to have LaTeX support.

configWorkspace.title: Path to ConTeXt
configWorkspace.description: Path to the `context` utility (overrides global setting if given).

latexmk.name: latexmk
latexmk.description: Builds the PDF via latexmk. Supports auto-update & preview with Skim via run button.

config.title: Main file
config.description: The file latexmk should be called upon

config.title: latexmk options
config.description: options that should be passed to latexmk. Should include a PDF processor, e.g. '-lualatex', if you do not use a latexmkrc file that specifies it. The '-synctex=1' option will always be added automatically.

context.name: context
context.description: Builds the PDF with context. Supports auto-update & preview with Skim via run button.

config.title: Main file
config.description: The file context should be called upon (defaults to the current file)
